personalityTemplates.title: The Natural Leader
personalityTemplates.description: You have a magnetic personality that draws people in. Your confidence and expressiveness make you a natural leader who isn't afraid to take charge.

personalityTemplates.title: The Deep Thinker
personalityTemplates.description: You possess a thoughtful and analytical mind. You prefer to observe and reflect before acting, making you an excellent problem solver.

personalityTemplates.title: The Creative Soul
personalityTemplates.description: You march to the beat of your own drum. Your creative spirit and independence allow you to see the world from unique perspectives.

personalityTemplates.title: The Steady Rock
personalityTemplates.description: You are the person others turn to for stability and support. Your balanced approach to life makes you incredibly reliable and trustworthy.

personalityTemplates.title: The Compassionate Heart
personalityTemplates.description: You have a deep well of empathy and understanding. Your sensitivity to others' emotions makes you a natural healer and supporter.
